name.baseName: Drilling engineering ; Natural gas hydrate ; Logging while drilling
钻井工程 ; 天然气水合物; 随钻测井

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: It is very necessary to carry out sensitive drilling without damage to gas hydrate reservoir. Logging-while drilling (LWD) has become an important means to identify gas hydrate occurrence and test gas hydrate reservoir properties in-situ during drilling
在尽量不损伤天然气水合物储层条件下开展敏感性钻探非常有必要，随钻测井( logging- while drilling，LWD) 已成为钻探过程中判识天然气水合物赋存和原位测试天然气水合物储层属性的 重要手段

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: South China Sea Shenhu Sea Area

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Drilling is the most direct means for gas hydrate exploration and discovery, and it is also a necessary link for gas hydrate development.
钻井是天然气水合物勘探发现最直接的手段，也是天然气水合物开发的必要环节。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set pertains to the drilling engineering process for the exploration and in-situ testing of natural gas hydrate occurrences through logging-while-drilling (LWD) technology. The drilling process is designed to avoid damage to the gas hydrate reservoirs, particularly in sensitive drilling operations. The process is applicable within the South China Sea Shenhu area, which has significant volumes of marine sediment-hosted gas hydrates, especially in sand-rich sedimentary deposits that are relatively easier to exploit. This data can inform drilling practices within such geological settings, providing guidance for both exploration and potential extraction phases of natural gas hydrate development.
该数据集涉及使用随钻测井(LWD)技术进行天然气水合物勘探和原位测试的钻井工程过程。钻探过程旨在避免损害气体水合物储藏层，特别是在敏感钻探操作中。该过程适用于南海神狐海域，在这些地区拥有大量海洋沉积物中的天然气水合物，特别是在相对容易开采的富砂质沉积体中。该数据可为此类地质环境下的钻探实践提供信息，为天然气水合物开发的勘探和潜在提取阶段提供指导。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Natural gas hydrate resources are huge, and more than 98% of them occur in marine sediments, among which the median amount of natural gas hydrate resources in sand-rich sediments which are relatively easy to exploit is about 1,226.4 × 10 m.
天然气水合物资源量巨大，且 98% 以上赋存于 海域沉积物中，其中，相对较易开采的富砂质沉 积体中的天然气水合物资源量中值约为 1 226. 4 × 10¹² m³。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The first gas hydrate field to realize commercial development is the Messoyakha gas field in Russia, which was discovered in 1967. The gas hydrate coexists with conventional natural gas in an upper-lower structure. The commercial development began in 1969, and the intermittent production reached the end of 2011. The cumulative gas production of gas hydrate is about 54 × 10m, accounting for 41.8% of the total gas production.
第一个实现商业化 开发的天然气水合物气田为俄罗斯的麦索亚哈 ( Messoyakha) 气田，该气田发现于 1967 年，天然气水合物与常规天然 气呈 上-下结构共存， 1969 年开始商业化开发，断续生产到 2011 年底，天 然气水合物累计产气量约 54 × 10⁸ m³ ，占总产气量 的 41. 8%。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 张金华, 樊波 & 刘瑞江. 天然气水合物钻探现状与钻井技术. 科学技术与工程 20, 14343–14351 (2020).
张金华, 樊波 & 刘瑞江. 天然气水合物钻探现状与钻井技术. 科学技术与工程 20, 14343–14351 (2020).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The information provided is critical for industrial actors engaging in the exploration and exploitation of gas hydrate fields, particularly in sensitive and potentially environmentally fragile marine environments. Users should account for technological advancements in the field of LWD and adapt the data in accordance with the latest safety and efficiency protocols. This data should also be interpreted while considering the unique geological features of the target site and current regulatory frameworks governing marine drilling activities. Environmental impact assessments should be integrated into the planning phase to ensure sustainable operations. Commercial viability, historical performance, and energy market conditions should be factored in when drawing conclusions from the data set.
提供的信息对于从事天然气水合物田的勘探和开采的工业行为者至关重要，尤其是在敏感且可能环境脆弱的海洋环境中。用户应考虑随钻测井领域的技术进步，并根据最新的安全和效率协议调整数据。解释这些数据时还应考虑目标场址的独特地质特征和当前管制海洋钻探活动的法规框架。环境影响评估应集成到规划阶段以确保可持续操作。在从数据集得出结论时，应考虑商业可行性、历史表现和能源市场条件。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. Accumulated total gas production
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。累计产气总量
The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. Continuous gas production through trial production
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。试采持续产气
The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. Daily average gas production
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。日均产气量
